3adde1be-fe08-4fad-946a-777a4f356353.description: Earners of this badge have attained their 'Ticket to Play', and have developed the fundamental knowledge required to effectively engage within a transformation, in alignment with the signature KPMG Transformation Experience.
3adde1be-fe08-4fad-946a-777a4f356353.name: Ticket to Play - Transformation Experience

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a portion of the KPMG Transformation Experience 'Ticket to Play' self-directed learning pathways
Complete a 45-minute, 25-30 question, online assessment with a score of 70% or higher

13098e76-43c3-4ad3-ac5f-d6e2dd68cdce.description: Earners of this badge understand the value and benefits of digital badging and how to leverage digital badges to recognize our peoples skills and experiences across all forms of learning. These individuals are capable of talking about the value of digital badges and how, as part of our wider learning ecosystem, they support our culture of life-long learning, signaling the in-demand skills important for growth.
13098e76-43c3-4ad3-ac5f-d6e2dd68cdce.name: KPMG Digital Badges - Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by KPMG Australia and authorized by KPMG International

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in shaping KPMG's digital badge program, leveraging best-practices to build and support our digital badge solution.

Led and/or contributed to discussions around digital badges at KPMG, ensuring all stakeholders understood the benefits of digital badges and how to maximise their success in our collective goal for life-long learning.

1350b4aa-b7ab-42f8-a1e9-5860634908cb.description: Earners of this badge have developed the core capabilities required to successfully act in a Program Manager role. A Program Manager oversees the delivery of larger organisational goals, and leads with strong attention to strategy, implementation and delegation. They are highly skilled professionals who help organisations stay on schedule, on spec, and ultimately on an upward trajectory of success and growth.
1350b4aa-b7ab-42f8-a1e9-5860634908cb.name: Program Manager - Leader

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve one of the following certifications: Managing Successful Programmes (MSP) Practitioner, or Program Management Professional (PgMP)
Complete the KPMG Advanced Waterfall self-study learning pathway
Establish one program benefits plan linked to strategic objectives
Complete a cumulative total of 12-months experience as a Portfolio Lead on an engagement(s)

ad27a50f-cd9b-4825-8ef7-c1bbf36212b7.description: Earners of this badge have developed the core capabilities required of an advanced PMO practitioner; shining a light on gold-standard portfolio, program and project management practices. They have displayed an understanding of navigating complex engagements and escalations, as well as program maturity and program recovery skillsets.
ad27a50f-cd9b-4825-8ef7-c1bbf36212b7.name: Project Management Office (PMO) Practitioner - Leader

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Portfolio, Programme, and Project Offices P3O Certification
Complete the KPMG Advanced PMO self-study learning pathway
Complete one portfolio or program maturity assessment, and lead the completion of one portfolio or program recovery
Complete a total of three engagements (or 2-years) leading a PMO/ePMO

1b96e18b-4272-4a0e-b7dd-0e485b161ba5.description: Earners of this badge have developed the core capabilities required to successfully execute the responsibilities of a PMO lead role. They have displayed knowledge of, and experience in, establishing a PMO/ePMO, as well as leading and managing an engagement's master schedule and key governance forums.
1b96e18b-4272-4a0e-b7dd-0e485b161ba5.name: Project Management Office (PMO) Practitioner - Specialist

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Prince 2 Practitioner Certification
Complete the KPMG Intermediate PMO self-study learning pathway
Establish one PMO/ePMO including defining roles and responsibilities, governance forums, and executive reporting
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience leading a PMO/ePMO on an engagement(s)

514cf06c-ca90-4149-809c-a1319802e968.description: Earners of this badge have developed the core capabilities required to successfully execute the responsibilities of a PMO support role. They have displayed a sufficient level of PMO/ePMO knowledge to drive and manage projects and programs of work.
514cf06c-ca90-4149-809c-a1319802e968.name: Project Management Office (PMO) Practitioner - Team Member

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Prince 2 Foundation Certification
Complete the KPMG Foundational PMO self-study learning pathway
Establish one project management plan (plan on a page) and one RAIDD register
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience in a PMO/ePMO support role on an engagement(s)

f2572a43-ad6c-4138-8e9b-e374ca6f7f81.description: Earners of this badge have developed the core capabilities required to successfully act in a senior Project Manager role. A senior Project Manager has an understanding of the principles, themes and processes that provide a clear roadmap for a program lifecycle (including strategic and complex projects). They are highly skilled transformation professionals who help and support organisations through the lifecycle of a program to deliver the new capability and desired outcomes.
f2572a43-ad6c-4138-8e9b-e374ca6f7f81.name: Project Manager - Specialist

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve one of the following certifications: Prince 2 Practitioner, Project Management Professional (PMP) or Managing Successful Programmes (MSP) Foundation
Complete the KPMG Intermediate Waterfall self-study learning pathway
Complete one project plan or schedule for a project, and risk management procedures for a project including carrying-out a risk assessment and establishing a RAIDD cadence/reporting framework
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience leading and directing a project / PMO on an engagement(s)

4d0f5224-db83-4eb8-8a93-9b7af3f01543.description: Earners of this badge have developed the building blocks of project management fundamentals, required to successfully execute the responsibilities of a project manager support role. They are highly skilled transformation professionals who understand and help organisations by setting-up projects and programs for success.
4d0f5224-db83-4eb8-8a93-9b7af3f01543.name: Project Manager - Team Member

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Prince 2 Foundation Certification
Complete the KPMG Foundational Waterfall self-study learning pathway
Establish and baseline one project charter, or establish and maintain one RAIDD register
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience in a project management support role on an engagement(s)

d1b3cc5a-89fb-4cdb-8cb0-9c01c2d8ebb2.description: Earners of this badge have developed the capabilities required to effectively act in a Release Train Engineer (RTE) role. A RTE facilitates and co-ordinates the Agile Release Train ceremonies and delivery execution. A RTE escalates impediments and manages risk, and helps ensure value delivery, synchronisation between the scrum teams and drive relentless improvement. They also participate in the Lean-Agile transformation, coaching leaders, teams and Scrum Masters in new processes and mindsets.
d1b3cc5a-89fb-4cdb-8cb0-9c01c2d8ebb2.name: Release Train Engineer - Senior

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the SAFe Release Train Engineer Certification
Complete the KPMG Advanced Agile self-study learning pathway
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience as a Release Train Engineer on an engagement(s)
Contribute to at least one piece of KPMG thought leadership within the Agile space

5b7a353e-38a1-4f1e-acc1-577348405561.description: Earners of this badge have developed the capabilities required to effectively participate in a Scaled Agile environment. A Scaled Agile Practitioner is a project leader or participant within an Agile Release Train, who can support and participate in scaled agile ceremonies. A Scaled Agile Practitioner encourages the adoption of scaled agile practices and lives business agility values within their project work.
5b7a353e-38a1-4f1e-acc1-577348405561.name: Scaled Agile Practitioner - Specialist

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the SAFe Agilist (SA) Certification
Complete the KPMG Intermediate Agile self-study learning pathway
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience as a Scaled Agile Practitioner on an engagement(s)
Contribute to at least one Scaled Agile proposal or bid

99ade6bc-0cf4-4525-9e77-329107e8d6a7.description: Earners of this badge have developed the capabilities required to effectively act in a Scaled Agile Program Consultant role. A Scaled Agile Program Consultant can be heavily involved in helping organisations to reach the tipping point to transition to enterprise agile, and then training leaders and change agents. A Scaled Agile Program Consultant may also be involved in that transition to enterprise agile by mapping value streams and identifying Agile Release Trains and supporting the launch.
99ade6bc-0cf4-4525-9e77-329107e8d6a7.name: Scaled Agile Program Consultant - Leader

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the SAFe Program Consultant (SPC) Certification
Complete the KPMG Advanced Agile self-study learning pathway
Successfully implement and launch an Agile Release Train with value stream identification
Contribute to at least one piece of KPMG thought leadership within the Agile space

94f2d021-6144-4404-ad6d-2a21112a464c.description: Earners of this badge have developed the capabilities required to effectively act in a Scrum Master role. A Scrum Master supports a cross-functional development team and helps the team apply the Scrum framework. A Scrum Master is responsible for ensuring the team follows agile values and principles, helps remove impediments that block the team's development, and protects the team from impacts that would affect the team's delivery.
94f2d021-6144-4404-ad6d-2a21112a464c.name: Scrum Master - Consultant

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the ABC Scrum Master Certification
Complete the KPMG Foundational Agile self-study learning pathway
Complete a cumulative total of 3-months experience as a Scrum Master on an engagement(s)

93d15853-8b02-4c0c-aaa1-b89db347ded4.description: Earners of this badge have developed the capabilities required to effectively act in an advanced Scrum Master role. An advanced Scrum Master is experienced in supporting cross-functional teams and helps the team apply the Scrum framework. An advanced Scrum Master may support a particularly complex product or act as the lead Scrum Master within a scrum of scrums or scaled agile environment, ensuring alignment between the scrum teams.
93d15853-8b02-4c0c-aaa1-b89db347ded4.name: Scrum Master - Specialist

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the SAFe Advanced Scrum Master (SASM) Certification
Complete the KPMG Intermediate Agile self-study learning pathway
Complete a cumulative total of 12-months experience as a Scrum Master on an engagement(s)

1e4e8072-5590-4890-ba0f-e02dd170d849.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental capability required to lead a stream of work with subject matter expertise, and to be a leader who can execute, teach and develop simultaneously. Earners are able to lead human-centred, creative and experimentative approaches to transformation solutions, in alignment with the signature KPMG Transformation Experience.
1e4e8072-5590-4890-ba0f-e02dd170d849.name: Stream Lead - Transformation Experience

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete at least 8 of the KPMG Transformation Experience 'Stream Lead' self-directed learning pathways of your choice
Complete a 45-minute, 25-30 question, online assessment with a score of 70% or higher
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience as a Stream Lead on an engagement(s)

b95ba6d2-99ad-4a06-b734-a04e99e016e4.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental capability required to actively contribute to a high performance and continual improvement culture, in alignment with the signature KPMG Transformation Experience. They are a trusted advisor to the client and to the KPMG delivery team, sharing insights and tailoring their approach to the evolving context.
b95ba6d2-99ad-4a06-b734-a04e99e016e4.name: Team Member - Transformation Experience

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete at least 8 of the KPMG Transformation Experience 'Team Member' self-directed learning pathways of your choice
Complete a 45-minute, 25-30 question, online assessment with a score of 70% or higher
Complete a cumulative total of 3-months experience as a Team Member on an engagement(s)

e12214d0-f126-4b95-a606-0f2b4da56a92.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental capability required to architect a target experience in transformation. The earner is a master in transformation who operates across the breadth of programs and depth of functions. They can create transformation blueprints to guide all streams of work to the transformation and maintain the source of truth, in alignment with the signature KPMG Transformation Experience.
e12214d0-f126-4b95-a606-0f2b4da56a92.name: Transformation Architect - Transformation Experience

alignments.name: Disclaimer:
alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete at least 8 of the KPMG Transformation Experience 'Transformation Architect' self-directed learning pathways of your choice
Complete a 45-minute, 25-30 question, online assessment with a score of 70% or higher
Complete a cumulative total of 6-months experience as a Transformation Architect on an engagement(s)

ba1805dd-0844-4a2d-a071-a8c0e104d0ea.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental capability required to manage the overall service, project management, quality assurance and representation of KPMG for large, complex transformations, in alignment with the signature KPMG Transformation Experience.
ba1805dd-0844-4a2d-a071-a8c0e104d0ea.name: Transformation Lead - Transformation Experience

alignments.description: This badge has been awarded based on KPMG's internal achievement criteria at the time the badge was attained. KPMG does not make any representation that our digital badges are a measure or guarantee of quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such.

Complete a 45-minute, 25-30 question, online assessment with a score of 70% or higher
